title: Settings
gemini25ProPaused: The Parakeet subtitle creation method is now available, please reinstall OSG Full from the .bat file to use it (using the update feature will not install this feature)
udbmIntroduction: Introducing UDBM, opensource database manager and more, download portable EXE
apiKeyDescription: Your API key is stored locally in your browser and never sent to our servers.
addGeminiKeyPlaceholder: Enter a new Gemini API key
geminiApiKeyHelp: Required for all functions. Get one at
youtubeApiKeyHelp: Required for YouTube search. Get one at
geniusApiKeyHelp: Required for lyrics fetching. Get one at
oauthDescription: OAuth 2.0 provides more reliable access to YouTube API. Get credentials at Google Cloud Console
createProject: Create a project in Google Cloud Console
copyClientCredentials: Copy Client ID and Client Secret
pasteAndAuthenticate: Paste them into the fields above and click Authenticate
redirectMismatchDescription: This error occurs when the redirect URI in your application doesn't match the URI registered in Google Cloud Console:
goToCredentials: Go to Google Cloud Console > APIs & Services > Credentials
findOAuthClient: Find your OAuth 2.0 client ID and click to edit
accessDeniedDescription: This error can occur for several reasons:
deniedPermission: You denied permission during OAuth authentication
apiNotEnabled: YouTube Data API is not enabled for your project
apiRestrictions: There are API restrictions on your OAuth client
goToLibrary: Go to Google Cloud Console > APIs & Services > Library
searchYouTubeAPI: Search for 'YouTube Data API v3' and make sure it's enabled
checkRestrictions: Check your OAuth client for API restrictions
appNotVerifiedDescription: New OAuth applications start in 'Testing' mode and can only be used by test users:
goToConsentScreen: Go to Google Cloud Console > APIs & Services > OAuth consent screen
addYourEmail: Add your Google email address as a test user
verificationNote: Note: You don't need to wait for verification if you add yourself as a test user. Verification is only required if you want to make your app available to all users.
showWaveformDescription: Display audio waveform visualization in the timeline. This helps identify silent parts and speech patterns.
showWaveformLongVideos: Show Waveform for Videos Longer than 30 Minutes
showWaveformLongVideosDescription: Enable waveform visualization for videos longer than 30 minutes. This may impact performance on very long videos.
timeFormatDescription: Choose how time is displayed in the timeline and lyrics.
geminiStep3: Create a new key or select existing
geminiStep5: Paste it into the field above
noGeminiKeys: No Gemini API keys added yet. Add your first key below.
multipleKeysDescription: Adding multiple Gemini API keys enables automatic failover. If one key encounters an error, the system will automatically try another key.
activeKeyDescription: The active key is used first. If it fails, other keys will be tried in sequence.
geniusStep4: Fill in the form: APP NAME: 'OSG' (or any name), APP WEBSITE URL: 'https://github.com/nganlinh4/oneclick-subtitles-generator', leave other fields empty, click Save
geniusStep5: Copy your Client Access Token from the created client
geniusStep6: Paste it into the field above
apiEnableWarning: You must enable the YouTube Data API v3 in your Google Cloud project before using your API key. If you get an error about "API not enabled", click the link above to enable it.
showGeminiEffectsDescription: Use Gemini starry sky effect and Gemini stars button effect. This can be turned off for low end devices and no functionalities will be affected
segmentDurationDescription: Choose how long each video segment should be when processing long videos. Shorter segments process faster but may be less accurate.
geminiModelDescription: Select the Gemini model to use for transcription. Different models offer trade-offs between accuracy and speed.
model20FlashDisabled: Gemini 2.0 Flash (Segment must start at the beginning of the video)
model20FlashLiteDisabled: Gemini 2.0 Flash Lite (Segment must start at the beginning of the video)
transcriptionPromptDescription: Customize the prompt sent to Gemini for transcription. The placeholder {contentType} (shown as a hovering icon) will be replaced with 'video' or 'audio' depending on the input type. This placeholder cannot be removed and is necessary for transcription to work properly.
promptPresetsDescription: Select a preset to quickly use common prompt types. You can also create your own presets.
structuredOutputDescription: Enable structured JSON output from Gemini API for more reliable parsing. This improves accuracy but may increase token usage.
useVideoAnalysisDescription: Settings for the "Add analysis" button, which analyze the entire video with Gemini to identify the best prompt pattern and generate transcription rules.
videoAnalysisModelDescription: Select the Gemini model to use for video analysis. 2.5 models have higher censorship and are prone to "unsafe content" errors.
videoAnalysisModel.simplified: Select the model to use for video analysis. 2.5 models have higher censorship and are prone to "unsafe content" errors.
videoAnalysisTimeoutDescription: Set the timeout for user input before automatically proceeding with the suggested preset.
videoAnalysisTimeout.simplified: Maximum time to wait for video analysis results before proceeding with default settings.
autoSelectDefaultPresetDescription: If enabled, the 'Use My Default Preset' option will be automatically selected in the Video Analysis Results pop-up when the timer expires. Otherwise, the 'Use Recommended' preset will be selected.
videoAnalysisCountdownDesc: How long to wait before auto-saving analysis rules when using automatic generation.
countdownNone: No countdown (trust the analysis, not recommended)
autoSplitSubtitlesDescription: Automatically split long subtitles into smaller segments for better readability. This is recommended over specifying short sentences in Gemini prompts (keep Gemini prompts natural and concise, only add constraints when necessary)
favoriteMaxSubtitleLength: Favorite max length of one subtitle
favoriteMaxSubtitleLengthDescription: Set the default maximum number of words per subtitle when auto-split is enabled.
optimizeVideosDescription: Reduces video resolution and frame rate to 1 FPS for smaller file sizes and to fit Gemini's input requirements (disabling will skip resize but take longer during upload/retry to Gemini)
optimizeVideosAlwaysEnabled: Videos are automatically optimized for Gemini processing by reducing frame rate to 1 FPS as per how Gemini processes videos. This can reduce file size by up to 30x helping reduce network load while maintaining sufficient quality for AI analysis and complying with current Gemini input requirements.
optimizedResolutionDescription: Select the resolution to use for optimized videos. Lower resolutions process faster but may reduce accuracy.
useOptimizedPreviewDescription: Display the optimized video in the preview player. This can improve performance on slower devices.
useOptimizedPreviewDescription.simplifie: Use the optimized video for preview instead of the original. This can improve performance on slower devices but will show lower quality video.
cacheDescription: Clear all cached files including subtitles, videos, uploaded files, generated content, narration audio, and temporary files to free up space.
cacheClearError: Error clearing cache. Please try again.
confirmClearCache: Are you sure you want to clear all cached subtitles and videos? This action cannot be undone.
cacheEmpty: Cache is empty. No files to clear.
confirmUpdate: Are you sure you want to update the application? This will pull the latest changes from the repository.
updateSuccess: Application updated successfully! Please refresh the page to see the changes.
confirmFactoryReset: Are you sure you want to perform a factory reset? This will clear all cache files and browser data of the OSG application. This cannot be undone.
factoryResetSuccess: Factory reset completed successfully. The application will now reload.
creator: Creator
appDescription: OSG is a tool for downloading videos, auto subtitles, editing subtitles, translating subtitles, creating narration, rendering, creating backgrounds, creating background music, and more for your videos.
updateDescription: Update to get the latest features and bug fixes.
upToDate: You are using the latest version!
modelManagement.title: Narration Model Management
modelManagement.description: Manage F5-TTS models for narration. You can add new models from Hugging Face or direct URLs, select which model to use, and delete models you no longer need.
modelManagement.noModelsInstalled: No models installed. Add a model to get started.
modelManagement.huggingFaceModelUrlHelp: URL to the model file on Hugging Face (e.g., hf://SWivid/F5-TTS/F5TTS_v1_Base/model_1250000.safetensors)
modelManagement.huggingFaceVocabUrlHelp: URL to the vocab file on Hugging Face (e.g., hf://SWivid/F5-TTS/F5TTS_v1_Base/vocab.txt)
modelManagement.directModelUrlHelp: Direct URL to the model file
modelManagement.directVocabUrlHelp: Direct URL to the vocab file
modelManagement.modelIdHelp: A unique identifier for this model (optional, will be generated if not provided)
modelManagement.languageCodeHelp: ISO 639-1 language code this model supports (e.g., 'en', 'vi', 'ko', 'zh')
modelManagement.editModelExplanation: Edit the information for this model. Changes will be applied immediately.
modelManagement.languageCodesHelp: Enter the language codes this model supports (e.g., en, fr, zh). Add multiple codes for multilingual models.
modelManagement.addModelExplanation: Add a custom TTS model from Hugging Face or a direct URL. The model will be downloaded and made available for narration.
modelManagement.modelConfigHelp: Advanced configuration options for the model in JSON format
modelManagement.deleteConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete the model '{{modelName}}'? This action cannot be undone.
modelManagement.invalidConfigFormat: Invalid configuration format. Please provide valid JSON.
modelManagement.modelDownloading: Model download started. You can close this dialog and check the status in the model management tab.
modelManagement.modelTemplateAdded: Model template added successfully! It will appear in Available Models.
modelManagement.allModelsInstalled: All available models are already installed
modelManagement.deleteFromCache: Also delete from Hugging Face cache
modelManagement.deleteFromCacheWarning: This will permanently delete the model files from your Hugging Face cache directory (C:\Users\<username>\.cache\huggingface\hub). This affects the repository: {{repoId}}
modelManagement.deleteFromCacheInfo: The model files will also be deleted from your Hugging Face cache directory to free up disk space. This affects the repository: {{repoId}}
modelManagement.noCacheModels: No models found in Hugging Face cache
modelManagement.usingSymlinks: This model is using symbolic links to save disk space. The model files are stored in the Hugging Face cache directory and linked to the application's models directory.
modelManagement.notUsingSymlinks: This model is using duplicate storage. The model files are copied from the Hugging Face cache to the application's models directory, consuming extra disk space.
modelManagement.originalFiles: Original files in Hugging Face cache
thinkingBudgetDescription: Configure how much thinking each AI model should use. Higher budgets allow more detailed reasoning but increase processing time and cost.
thinkingBudget25ProDesc: Cannot disable thinking. Choose dynamic or set custom token budget.
thinkingBudget25FlashDesc: Can be disabled for fastest response, dynamic for auto, or custom token budget.
thinkingBudget25FlashLiteDesc: Disabled by default for fastest response. Choose dynamic or custom token budget.
useCookiesForDownload: Use browser cookies for video downloads
useCookiesForDownloadDescription: Enable browser cookie authentication to access higher quality videos and bypass login restrictions. Disabling this will make downloads faster but may limit available video qualities and cause failures on restricted content.
autoImportSiteSubtitlesDescription: When available, automatically fetch and prefill subtitles from the site while the video is downloading. You can replace them later by uploading your own or regenerating.
enableYoutubeSearchDescription: Show the "Search YouTube" tab in input methods and enable YouTube API authentication settings. This is an optional method since Youtube videos can be download via "Video URL" method
concurrentClientsDescription: Number of simultaneous API requests to process in parallel. Higher values increase speed but may hit rate limits.

customGeminiModels.title: Custom Gemini Models
customGeminiModels.description: Add custom Gemini model IDs to use in dropdowns throughout the application. These models will appear in all model selection menus.

customModels.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this custom model?
customModels.modelExists: A model with this ID already exists

geminiApiKeyRequired: Please set your Gemini API key in the settings
noGeminiModelsAvailable: No Gemini models available with your API key
noSuitableGeminiModels: No suitable Gemini models found for audio generation
invalidGeminiApiKey: Invalid Gemini API key or API access issue
